env HOME=$WORK/home
mkdir $HOME
env GOPATH=$HOME/go

go mod tidy

go run .
stdout '^Greeting: Hello$'
! stderr .+

gopherjs run main.go
stdout '^Greeting: Hello$'
! stderr .+

-- go.mod --
module example.com/main

-- main.go --
package main

import (
	"fmt"

	"example.com/hello"
)

func main() {
	fmt.Printf("Greeting: %v\n", hello.Greeting)
}
